body_content.explanation: a tropical evergreen plant (= one that never loses its leaves), often grown inside, that has large leaves that grow divided into sections or with holes in them :
examples: I washed the dust off the large rubber plants and Swiss cheese plants and then sprayed the leaves to make them shine.
If the plants are not treated well, any new leaves will lack the deep cuts and holes that under ideal conditions give them the name Swiss cheese plant.
